snippet: Theater props masters gathered to talk shop, including the fine art of creating stage vomit, outfitting a chair that speaks volumes and fashioning nonlethal weapons.
abstract: Theater props masters informally gather at the Public Theater to network, watch demonstrations and exchange insider tips on the latest techniques in an area of theatrical design that often goes unnoticed and unheralded.
lead_paragraph: Theater props masters gathered to talk shop, including the fine art of creating stage vomit, outfitting a chair that speaks volumes and fashioning nonlethal weapons.

headline.seo: Theater Props Masters Gather at the Public Theater
headline.main: Blood to Rain, in a Bag of Tricks
headline.print_headline: Blood to Rain, In a Bag of Tricks
